passive.name: Gift from the Rift
passive.leverage_when: Looting one item from distant death boxes
passive.misuse_warning: Relying on it for specific high-tier items (one item limit)

tactical.name: Void Passage
tactical.misuse_warning: Portaling directly into an enemy stack without info

ultimate.name: Void Nexus
ultimate.intent: Global team reset and extraction insurance
ultimate.misuse_warning: Placing in exposed locations where enemies can camp your return
